thread.section_title: Technology - Internet Related Businesses For Sale in Canada
thread.title: Web Based Billing Software Company

title: Web Based Billing Software Company
text: Questions Business Summary billAnywhere is a fully functional online billing and inventory management system that is capable of being used by any industry to manage inventory and sell products. visit billanywhere.com for the full feature set We have developed billanywhere.com for a period of 3 years but do not have the revenues or the resources to fully market and sell it as a service, therefore we have decided to sell the technology including the domain name. The technology is perfect for a business to re-sell it as a service to their clients with alot of potential revenue. We could provide the maintenance and upgrade services if required. Make us an offer. Financials Gross Revenues: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow Type: Sellers Discretionary Cash Seller Financing: Not Disclosed
